  <script>
   var u = window.psUnescapeHTML = window.psUnescapeHTML || function (html) {
        var el = document.createElement('span')
        el.innerHTML = html
        return el.innerText
    }

    var du = window.psDoubleUnescapeHTML = window.psDoubleUnescapeHTML || function (html) {
        return u(u(html))
    }

    var ua = window.psUnescapeArray = window.psUnescapeArray || function (arr) {
        for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
            arr[i] = du(arr[i])
        }
        return arr
    }
  </script>

}

	 padding-bottom: 0px;
}

    padding-bottom: 0px !important;

	border-radius: 0 !important;
    height: 100% !important;
    width: 100% !important;
}

  <!-- Needed for IE 11 -->
  <!-- Copied from https://unpkg.com/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs@2.5.0/custom-elements-es5-adapter.js -->

(function () {
    'use strict';

    (function(){if(void 0===window.Reflect||void 0===window.customElements||window.customElements.polyfillWrapFlushCallback)return;const a=HTMLElement;window.HTMLElement={HTMLElement:function HTMLElement(){return Reflect.construct(a,[],this.constructor)}}.HTMLElement,HTMLElement.prototype=a.prototype,HTMLElement.prototype.constructor=HTMLElement,Object.setPrototypeOf(HTMLElement,a);})();

  </script>
  <!-- /styleguide/util/IEPolyfills.js -->
  <script>
   /**
        This allows us to load the IE polyfills via feature detection so that they do not load
        needlessly in the browsers that do not need them. It also ensures they are loaded
        non async so that they load before the rest of our JS.
    */
    if (!window.CSS || !window.CSS.supports || !window.CSS.supports('--fake-var', 0)) {
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.setAttribute('src', "https://arizent.brightspotcdn.com/resource/00000174-26a2-d19a-ad7c-2eebcf9a0000/styleguide/util/IEPolyfills.319b832a53b1bca4a43d349642756b19.gz.js");
        script.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
        script.async = false;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);
    }
  </script>
  <script>
   /**
            Importing fonts via CSS slows the browser down. Best practices for mobile
            performance is to load them as rel=preload. The following code allows us
            to do that for browsers that support preload.
            https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/optimizing-content-efficiency/webfont-optimization
        */
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        var googleFonts = ['Roboto', 'Ubuntu', 'Spectral', 'Montserrat', 'Open Sans', 'Lato', 'Cormorant'];
        var fontFamily = 'Lato';
        var fontUrl = googleFonts.indexOf(fontFamily) !== -1 ? 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=' + fontFamily + ':300,300i,400,400i,700,700i,900,900i' : '/styleguide/fonts/Lato.css';
        link.setAttribute('href', fontUrl);
        var relList = link.relList;
        if (relList && relList.supports('preload')) {
            link.setAttribute('as', 'style');
            link.setAttribute('rel', 'preload');
            link.setAttribute('onload', 'this.rel="stylesheet"');
            link.setAttribute('crossorigin', 'anonymous');
        } else {
            link.setAttribute('rel', 'stylesheet');
        }
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(link);
  </script>

  </script>

   // Piano adblock detection script

    var setNptTechAdblockerCookie = function(adblocker) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + 60 * 5 * 1000);
        document.cookie = "__adblocker=" + (adblocker ? "true" : "false") + "; expires=" + d.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
    };
    var script = document.createElement("script");
    script.setAttribute("async", true);

  <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.4.1/jquery.min.js">

  <script>
   "use strict";
// Store referrer URL on first load of modal_optin page.
window.addEventListener("message", modalOptinHandler, false); 
// Sending subscriber email from Piano template to front-end.
// Making sure Piano library is loaded or create a temp queue 
var tp = window.tp || [];
tp.push(["addHandler", "customEvent", function (event, b, c, d) {
  switch (event.eventName) {
    case 'daily-email-signup':
      var email,
          source_url = location.href,
          submission_date = new Date().toISOString(),
          obj_brand = {};
      obj_brand['ab.uat.serial2.source-media.psdops.com'] = 'American Banker Dev';
      obj_brand['www.americanbanker.com'] = 'American Banker';
      obj_brand['www.accountingtoday.com'] = 'Accounting Today';
      obj_brand['asreport.americanbanker.com'] = 'Asset Securitization Report';
      obj_brand['bic.financial-planning.com'] = 'Bank Investment Consultant';
      obj_brand['www.bondbuyer.com'] = 'Bond Buyer';
      obj_brand['www.americanbanker.com/creditunions'] = 'Credit Union Journal';
      obj_brand['www.dig-in.com'] = 'Digital Insurance';
      obj_brand['www.employeebenefitadviser.com'] = 'Employee Benefit Adviser';
      obj_brand['www.benefitnews.com'] = 'Employee Benefit News';
      obj_brand['www.financial-planning.com'] = 'Financial Planning';
      obj_brand['www.themiddlemarket.com'] = 'Mergers & Acquisitions';
      obj_brand['money-management-executive'] = 'Money Management Executive';
      obj_brand['www.nationalmortgagenews.com'] = 'National Mortgage News';
      obj_brand['onwallstreet.financial-planning.com'] = 'On Wall Street';
      obj_brand['www.paymentssource.com'] = 'PaymentsSource';
      obj_brand['www.taxprotoday.com'] = 'Tax Pro Today';
      if (typeof event.params.email != 'undefined' && event.params.email.length > 0) {
        email = event.params.email;
      } 
      // Making sure Zeta library is loaded or create a temp queue 
      var bt = window.bt || function () {
        (window._bt = window._bt || []).push(arguments);
      },
          brand;
      if (location.pathname.includes('money-management-executive')) {
        brand = obj_brand['money-management-executive'];
       } else if (location.pathname.includes('/creditunions')) {
           brand = obj_brand['www.americanbanker.com/creditunions'];
       } else {
        brand = obj_brand[location.hostname];
      } 
      // Identify users
      bt('updateUser', {
        email: email
      });
      var utm_params = {
        'utm_source': getCookieValue('sm_utm_source'),
        'utm_medium': getCookieValue('sm_utm_medium'),
        'utm_campaign': getCookieValue('sm_utm_campaign'),
        'utm_content': getCookieValue('sm_utm_content')
      }; 
      // Track client Leadgen event
      bt('track', 'modal_optin', {
        brand: brand,
        submission_date: submission_date,
        utm_params: utm_params,
        source_url: source_url,
        source_type: getSourceType(),
        other_referrer: getOtherReferrer()
      });
      //console.info(event.params);
      break;
  }
}]);
function getOtherReferrer() {
  return sessionStorage.getItem('other_referrer');
}
function setOtherReferrer() {
  if (!sessionStorage.getItem('other_referrer')) {
    var referrer = window.parent.document.referrer;
    sessionStorage.setItem('other_referrer', referrer);
  }
}
// Not used - use getOtherReferrer instead
function getOtherReferrerCookie() {
  return getCookieValue('other_referrer');
}
/* Not used - use setOtherReferrer instead
*  grab and store referrer of first load */
function setOtherReferrerCookie() {
  if (!getCookieValue('other_referrer')) {
    var referrer = window.parent.document.referrer;
    var path = location.pathname;
    setCookie('other_referrer', referrer, path);
  }
}
function getSourceType() {
  var path = location.pathname,
      homepage = '/',
      cujhomepage= '/creditunions',
      subscribe_RE = /\/subscribe/i,
      cardshow_RE = /\/list/i;
  if (path == homepage) return 'homepage';
  if (path == cujhomepage) return 'homepage';
  if (subscribe_RE.test(path)) return 'subscribe';
  if (cardshow_RE.test(path)) return 'cardshow';
  return 'article';
}
function getCookieValue(name) {
  var re = new RegExp(name + '=([^ ;]+)');
  var val = document.cookie.match(re);
  return val ? val[1] : null;
}
function setCookie(name, value, path) {
  if (path === void 0) {
    path = '/';
  }
  document.cookie = name + "=" + value + "; path=" + path + ";";
}
function modalOptinHandler(e) {
    if(!e.origin.includes('tinypass.com')) return;
    var eventMessage = e.data;
    if(eventMessage == 'modal_optin') {
        setOtherReferrer();
    }
}
  </script>
  <script>
   (function (window) {
    document.addEventListener(
        "DOMContentLoaded",
        function() {
            var selector = "ps-html5player";
            var videoPlayer = document.querySelector(selector);
            if (!videoPlayer) return;

            //using stalled event for error
            const video = videoPlayer.querySelector("video");
            if (video) {
                video.addEventListener("canplay", actionHandler, false);
                video.addEventListener("play", actionHandler, false);
                video.addEventListener("pause", actionHandler, false);
                video.addEventListener("ended", actionHandler, false);
                video.addEventListener("stalled", actionHandler, false);
                video.addEventListener("error", actionHandler, false);
            }

            function actionHandler(e) {
                let videoEvent = e,
                    action = getVideoAction(videoEvent.type),
                    isInteractionHit = action == "play" || action == "pause",
                    eventName = "videoAction",
                    id,
                    title,
                    obj,
                    dataLayer;

                id = videoPlayer.dataset.videoId;
                title =
                    videoPlayer.dataset.videoTitle ||
                    document.querySelector(".VideoPage-headline").innerText;


                obj = {
                    event: eventName,
                    videoActionData: {
                        id: id,
                        title: title,
                        action: action,
                        nonInteractionHit: !isInteractionHit,
                    },
                };
                dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                dataLayer.push(obj);
                //console.info(obj)
            }
            function getVideoAction(eventType) {
                var action;
                switch (eventType) {
                    case "canplay":
                        action = "Video Load";
                        break;
                    case "play":
                        action = "Video Play";
                        break;
                    case "pause":
                        action = "Video Pause";
                        break;
                    case "ended":
                        action = "Video End";
                        break;
                    case "error":
                        action = "Error";
                        break;
                }

                return action;
            }
        },
        false
    );
})(window);
  </script>
  <script>
   (function(window) {
	// Tracks Audio Actions: Play, Pause, Ended, Error
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', audioActionListener, false);

    function audioActionListener(){
        let eventList = ['play', 'pause', 'ended', 'stalled'];
        document.querySelectorAll('audio').forEach(function(audio) {

            eventList.forEach(function(event) {
                audio.addEventListener(event, function() {
                    dataLayerPush(getEventData(event, audio));
                    //console.info(`${event} event received`)
                })
            });
        });

    }

    function dataLayerPush(obj) {
        if(typeof obj != 'object') return;

        var dl = window.dataLayer || [];
        dl.push(obj);
        //console.log(obj);
    }

    function getEventData(eventType, audio) {
        if(typeof eventType != 'string') return;
        
        var isInteractionHit = (eventType == 'play' || eventType == 'pause'),
            currentSrc = audio.currentSrc,
            sourceArr = currentSrc.split('/'),
            title = sourceArr.pop(),
            id = sourceArr.pop(),
            percentPlayed = getPercentPlayed(audio);

        
        return {
                'event': 'audioAction',
                'audioActionData': {
                    'id': id,
                    'title': title,
                    'action': eventType,
                    'percentPlayed': percentPlayed,
                    'nonInteractionHit': !isInteractionHit
                    }
                };
    }

    function getPercentPlayed(audio) {
        const ppp = (audio.currentTime / audio.duration * 100).toFixed(2);
        return ppp;
    }
})(window);
  </script>
  <script>
   (function(window) {
"use strict";

window.addEventListener("message", handlePianoMessage, false);
function handlePianoMessage(event) {
  //is event from Piano
  var regex = /tinypass.com/;
  if (!event.origin.match(regex)) return;
 try {
  var data = JSON.parse(event.data);   
	var isLeadersHardgate = data.event == 'leaders_hardgate';
    if(isLeadersHardgate) {
        var video = document.querySelector('video');
        if(video) video.pause();
    }
 } catch(e){ console.info(e);}
}
})(window);
  </script>
  <script>
   var tp = window.tp || [];
(function(window){
    window.addEventListener('load', function(e){
        function removeClass(){
            var myAccount = document.querySelector('nav > .Navigation-buttons > .Navigation-buttons-button');
            //console.info('User logged in: ' + tp.user.isUserValid());
            if(myAccount && tp.user && tp.user.isUserValid()) {
                myAccount.classList.remove("Navigation-buttons-button");
            }
        }
        removeClass();
        removeClass();    
    });
})(window);
  </script>

});

          <div class="NavigationItem">
           <div class="NavigationItem-text">
            <a class="NavigationItem-text-link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/practice-management">
             Practice Management
            </a>

         </li>

          <li class="StandardList-items-item">

        <ps-banner class="PromoBannerBreakingNewsHeader">
         <div class="PromoBannerBreakingNewsHeader-wrapper">
          <div class="PromoBannerBreakingNewsHeader-content">
           <div class="PromoBannerBreakingNewsHeader-title">
            IRS clarifies deductibility of PPP loan expenses, as AICPA criticizes forgiveness questionnaire
           </div>
           <div class="PromoBannerBreakingNewsHeader-description">
            The guidance clears up the tax treatment of expenses when a loan from the Paycheck Protection Program hasnt been forgiven by the end of the year.
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </ps-banner>

             <div class="PromoLargeImageRight-title">
              <a href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/list/people-firms-on-the-move-armanino-achieves-b-corporation-certification" target="">
               <span class="PromoLargeImageRight-headlineText">
                People &amp; firms on the move: Armanino achieves B Corp certification
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="PromoLargeImageRight-description">
              Citrin Cooperman co-founder Niles Citrin announces retirement; BKD names regional managing partner; and more CPA news.
             </div>
             <div class="PromoLargeImageRight-bottomWrapper">

         <div class="TwoColumnContainer7030 container-module">
          <div class="TwoColumnContainer7030-row">
           <div class="TwoColumnContainer7030-column">
            <ps-list-loadmore class="MediumImageRightStackedList">
             <ul class="MediumImageRightStackedList-items" data-list-loadmore-items="">
              <li class="MediumImageRightStackedList-items-item">
               <div class="PromoMediumImageRight" data-content-type="article">
                <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-content">
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-category">
                  <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/biden-administration">
                   Biden Administration
                  </a>
                 </div>
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-title">
                  <a href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/news/scoping-out-bidens-legislative-and-tax-agenda" target="">
                   Scoping out Bidens legislative and tax agenda
                  </a>
                 </div>
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-description">
                  Experts read the tea leaves in the American Rescue Plan and other early hints of the administrations revenue proposals.
                 </div>
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-bottomWrapper">
                  <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
                   <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-byline-content">
                    <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-authorName" itemprop="name">
                     By
                     <a href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/author/roger-russell">
                      Roger Russell
                     </a>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-timeSince">
                   March 19
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-mediaWrapper" data-is-opinion-promo="false">
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-media">
                  <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/news/scoping-out-bidens-legislative-and-tax-agenda">
                   <img alt="yellen-janet-treasury.jpg" class="Image lazyload" data-lazy-load="true" data-src="https://arizent.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/88f2537/2147483647/strip/true/crop/3500x1971+0+0/resize/460x259!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsource-media-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fa9%2Fc4%2Ffc918cb54be79b90b82d13b2bf6a%2F366234502.jpg" height="259" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" width="460"/>
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="MediumImageRightStackedList-items-item">
               <div class="PromoMediumImageRight" data-content-type="article">
                <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-content">
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-category">
                  <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/philanthropy">
                   Philanthropy
                  </a>
                 </div>
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-title">
                  <a href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/list/firms-giving-back-grant-thornton-honors-7th-purple-paladin-recipient" target="">
                   Firms giving back: Grant Thornton honors 7th Purple Paladin recipient
                  </a>
                 </div>
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-description">
                  Brown Schultz Sheridan &amp; Fritz announces two annual initiatives for minority students; and Test Prep Insight opens its $1,000 student scholarship.
                 </div>
                 <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-bottomWrapper">
                  <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
                   <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-byline-content">
                    <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-authorName" itemprop="name">
                     By
                     <a href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/author/sean-mccabe">
                      Sean McCabe
                     </a>
                    </div>

                  </div>
                  <div class="PromoMediumImageRight-timeSince">

            <div class="HomePageLeadList">
             <div class="HomePageLeadList-header">
              <div class="HomePageLeadList-title ListHeader-title">
               THE TOP 100 FIRMS/REGIONAL LEADERS
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="HomePageLeadList-items">
              <div class="HomePageLeadList-items-item">
               <div class="PromoLeadItem">
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-media">
                 <a aria-label="The top 100 firms and regional leaders" class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/report/the-top-100-firms-and-regional-leaders">
                  <img alt="2021 Top 100 Firms logo - sidewise" class="Image lazyload" data-lazy-load="true" data-src="https://arizent.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/3b03f9a/2147483647/strip/true/crop/2230x1257+0+178/resize/520x293!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsource-media-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fa3%2F18%2F92497fd340d0a259410d59a0d55f%2F2021-top-100-firms-cover-logo.jpg" height="293" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" width="520"/>
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-headline-prefix">
                 Report
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-title">
                 <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/report/the-top-100-firms-and-regional-leaders">
                  The top 100 firms and regional leaders
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-description">
                 This annual ranking of the leading national and local firms also includes data analysis, as well as their chief executives take on the major issues facing their firms, and their strategies for success for 2021 and beyond.
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="HomePageLeadList-items-item">
               <div class="PromoLeadItem" data-content-type="article">

            <div class="HomePageLeadList">
             <div class="HomePageLeadList-header">
              <div class="HomePageLeadList-title ListHeader-title">
               THE BIDEN ADMINISTRATION
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="HomePageLeadList-items">
              <div class="HomePageLeadList-items-item">
               <div class="PromoLeadItem" data-content-type="article">
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-media">
                 <a aria-label="Treasury clears states to cut taxes  but not with stimulus" class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/articles/treasury-clears-states-to-cut-taxes-but-not-with-stimulus">
                  <img alt="treasury-capitol-steps.jpg" class="Image lazyload" data-lazy-load="true" data-src="https://arizent.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/5be9f9b/2147483647/strip/true/crop/1952x1100+48+0/resize/520x293!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsource-media-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2F0e%2Ff8%2Ff0331b0845a19b8358044f7e7738%2F370116727.jpg" height="293" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" width="520"/>
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-tags">
                 <a aria-label="Tax cuts" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/tax-cuts" target="_self">
                  Tax cuts
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="Treasury Department" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/organization/treasury-department" target="_self">
                  Treasury Department
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="State taxes" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/state-taxes" target="_self">
                  State taxes
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="Biden Administration" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/biden-administration" target="_self">
                  Biden Administration
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="Coronavirus" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/coronavirus" target="_self">
                  Coronavirus
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-category">
                 <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/tax-cuts">
                  Tax cuts
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-title">
                 <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/articles/treasury-clears-states-to-cut-taxes-but-not-with-stimulus">
                  Treasury clears states to cut taxes  but not with stimulus
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-description">
                 The Biden administration said in a response to concerns raised by Republicans that state governments accepting pandemic-relief money from Washington are allowed to cut taxes, but only if they dont use the federal aid to offset those reductions.
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-meta">
                 <div class="PromoLeadItem-time-wrapper">
                  <div class="PromoLeadItem-timeSince">
                   March 19
                  </div>
                  <div class="PromoLeadItem-duration">
                   2 Min Read
                  </div>

               </div>
              </div>

                 </a>

                  Tax relief
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-title">
                 <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/news/senators-introduce-bills-to-amend-american-rescue-plan">
                  Senators introduce bills to amend American Rescue Plan
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-description">
                 Senate Democrats are sponsoring legislation to safeguard stimulus payments from debt collectors, while Republicans want states to be able to use funds from the new relief package for tax cuts.
                </div>

                 </a>
                </div>

                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-tags">
                 <a aria-label="IRS" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/organization/irs" target="_self">
                  IRS
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label='Charles "Chuck" Rettig' class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/person/charles-rettig" target="_self">
                  Charles "Chuck" Rettig
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="Tax relief" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/tax-relief" target="_self">
                  Tax relief
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="Tax season" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/tax-season" target="_self">
                  Tax season
                 </a>
                 <a aria-label="Coronavirus" class="PromoTag" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/tag/coronavirus" target="_self">
                  Coronavirus
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-category">
                 <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/organization/irs">
                  IRS
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-title">
                 <a class="Link" href="https://www.accountingtoday.com/articles/irs-to-automatically-process-refunds-on-jobless-benefit-payments">
                  IRS to automatically process refunds on jobless-benefit payments
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-description">
                 The IRS will automatically process refunds for individuals who paid taxes on their unemployment benefits before Congress passed a law making those payments tax-free, Commissioner Chuck Rettig said.
                </div>
                <div class="PromoLeadItem-meta">
                 <div class="PromoLeadItem-time-wrapper">
                  <div class="PromoLeadItem-timeSince">
                   March 18
                  </div>
                  <div class="PromoLeadItem-duration">
                   3 Min Read
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="TwoColumnContainer7030-column">
